text: Bodieve () is a small village in north Cornwall, England, in the United Kingdom. It is about 1 mile north of Wadebridge (where the 2011 Census population is included) on the B3314 Wadebridge-St Minver road.Ordnance Survey: Landranger map sheet 200 Newquay & Bodmin ==References== ==External links== Category:Villages in Cornwall Category:Wadebridge
title: Bodieve
